name: innately
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
connected with a quality or ability that you were born with, not one you have learned: I don't believe that human beings are innately evil. He has the ability to create characters we can innately understand. See
innate
More examplesFewer examplesShe was strong, patient and innately wise.It's difficult for any of us to change who we innately are.Swimming and flying are things animals do innately.
